title: State and local opposition to new data centers is gaining steam
description: A new study found the total value of blocked or delayed data center projects during a three-month stretch earlier this year exceeded the total in the prior two years, signaling accelerating opposition to a foundational piece of artificial intelligence development in the U.S.The study — conducted by Data Center Watch, a project of AI intelligence firm 10a Labs that tracks local data center activity — found that an estimated $98 billion in data center projects were blocked or delayed from late March through June.

title: Demystifying AI: Neel Jogani's Guide for the Everyday Learner
description: Neel Jogani, a computer engineering student, has released 'AI for Everyone: A Friendly Guide to Artificial Intelligence in Daily Life.' The book simplifies AI concepts for all readers, making it relatable and easy to understand, while encouraging the ethical and enthusiastic embrace of AI in daily life.
